name: Live Torment: Gary's Damnation
description:
Description:

You are Gary, a man with a bucket on his head who has ended up in hell. Collect souls for Lilith, hell's number one live streamer, while a strange demon named Grubb follows you around with a camera. All your success and failures will be streamed live to all of Lilith's fans.

Now go get to collecting souls.

Controls:

Move Player: WASD / Left Joystick

Move Camera: Mouse / Right Joystick

Jump: Spacebar / A(Xbox) / X(PlayStation)

Exit: Esc / Start(controller)

You can hold jump, to jump higher and longer

Game was made for the LTGD: Let's Talk Game Jam. Took just under 9 days to make with almost no experience in Godot.

* Yes, the game can be beaten. Suffering is part of the experience.

Created by: DG Automata and Aaron Smith

Music by: Mike Memzi
